title: Promoting Good Cyber Hygiene Act of 2017
content: Promoting Good Cyber Hygiene Act of 2017 This bill requires the National Institute of Standards and Technology to establish for use by thenbsp. Federal government, the private sector, and any person utilizing an information system or device a list of best practices to defend against common cybersecurity threats or risks. nbsp, The Department of Homeland Security mustnbsp. Assess cybersecurity threats, the effect of such threats on the federal government's information systems and networks, and submit recommendations for addressing such threats.
